summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5928 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South, from Willow Street to Othello Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78431, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
